Let Us Help You Be Something Awesome.

We Are Here For You.

Fence Supply & branding

Fence supply and branding on the fence is one of our special services. We have our in-house printing and installation facility and team to do branding on the fence.

Consultancy

When you are not sure about the solution you want, be it type of security, Gates, Automation, we are there to advise you.

Residential & Commerical Fencing

We will work with you to choose the fence most suitable for your property. Our team can advise on fence types and functionality to meet your expectations.

About Us

  • Repairs
  • Types
  • Gates

We are an innovative company designed to produce specialized solutions in business of all kinds of metal fabrication and glazing work. Its main aim is to storm in the Middle East market on construction, manufacturing and facility maintenance. This will not only make the company competitive on the field of fabrication but also put the company among the best in the field.

The FItta Fence System is made up of strong, quality, recycled components. Featuring an intuitive post and rail system. Fitta Fence is easy to use, understand and assemble! Contact a Fitta expert today for an obligation free quote

We are an innovative company designed to produce specialized solutions in business of all kinds of metal fabrication and glazing work. Its main aim is to storm in the Middle East market on construction, manufacturing and facility maintenance. This will not only make the company competitive on the field of fabrication but also put the company among the best in the field.

We set the benchmark for perimeter security fencing, with 10+ years of experience in installations and consultations. For any questions or queries do not hesitate to get in touch with one of our sales consultants.

As one of Cape Town's leading suppliers & installers of steel fencing materials, here at Alert Boundary, we believe in creating an experience where you the customer, comes first. For steel fencing supplies and qualified fencing installers, we offer products from Cape Town's most trusted brands and can source products for you at competitive prices.
